name: Survive 30 Seconds
description:
Survive 30 Seconds is a game where you are in a lab without knowing how or when you get there. Survive 30 seconds or you'll be reset, if you get reset 5 times your dead.

Update:

nerfed some part of the level and also nerfed the ability

note: the ability will turn your screen black(no its not because your game crash), it'll boost your speed and jump. You may skip the dialog it's just there for story

Have Fun Playing.
